query: ALTER TABLE defects MODIFY COLUMN status ENUM('open', 'in_progress', 'resolved', 'verified', 'reported', 'rca_pending', 'action_plan', 'assigned', 'implemented', 'verification', 'closed', 'rejected') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'reported';
